long_description: The rugged stainless-steel MSR Alpine 3 pot set provides long-lasting, reliable performance. All pots, plus lid nest securely in the 3-liter pot for compact storage; storage sack included. Comes with all-purpose 1-, 2- and 3-liter pot sizes; lids perform double duty as dinner plates. Lightweight PanHandler(TM) securely lifts pots and lids, easily grasping and holding up to 10 lbs. Scratch and dent resistant stainless steel stands up in the most rugged conditions. Rounded corners helps heat travel up sides of pot more quickly, boosting efficiency.
short_description: The rugged stainless-steel MSR Alpine 3 pot set provides long-lasting, reliable performance.
